subject: Hockey, Ice
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: While recent N.H.L. drafts contained few surprises at the top, nobody knows for sure what the Oilers will do at the Staples Center Friday night — not even the teenagers at the center of it.
snippet: While recent N.H.L. drafts contained few surprises at the top, nobody knows for sure what the Oilers will do at the Staples Center Friday night — not even the teenagers at the center of it.
